name: All the Delicate Duplicates
publisher: One to One Development Trust - Dreaming Methods
description: John, a single father, inherits a collection of arcane objects from his mysterious relative named Mo. Over time, John and his daughter Charlotte begin to realise that these objects have unusual properties: the more they are exposed to them, the more their reality and memories appear to change.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: i7 Memory: 2 GB RAM DirectX: Version 9.0 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 1 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: i7 Memory: 8 GB RAM DirectX: Version 9.0 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 2 GB available space
